verbose_text: It can be seen that at condition I with 0.7 U EcTAL, 1 U M-StDAPDH, 2 U PFDH, 100 mm l-threonine, and 150 mm ammonium formate in Na 2 CO 3 -NaHCO 3 buffer (pH 9.0), the yield of product was close to 90% in 24 h. Enhancing the amount of EcTAL increased the reaction rate, as evidenced by the fact that the yield of d-2-aminobutyric acid was improved from 52 to 92% at 8 h when 2.0 U EcTAL was added instead of 0.7 U enzyme.
